properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes California out to 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 15 at 8:34PM PST until February 17 at 3:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 15
to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas 8 to 10 feet at 13
seconds. For the second Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds
15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes
California out to 10 nm.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 AM PST Sunday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, from 3 PM Sunday to 3 AM PST
Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SUNDAY TO 3 AM PST MONDAY
